info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 4:20PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Goliad and north central Bee Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 420 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Charco, or 9 miles west of Goliad, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Goliad, Charco and Berclair. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 634 and 642. US Highway 59 between mile markers 666 and 684. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
